Halt to Infringement on Human Rights in Phyongthaek Urged
articles.content:
Halt to Infringement on Human Rights in Phyongthaek Urged 
   Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- Members of the civic and public organizations including the "group for the investigation into violence and encroachment upon human rights in Phyongthaek" reportedly held a press conference in Seoul on May 25 to demand a halt to the human rights violations now being committed in Phyongthaek, the site planned for the expansion of the U.S. military base.
 Speakers there strongly demanded that the military and police forces pull out of Taechu-ri and Todu-ri as early as possible as they regard inhabitants there as "enemy".
